EmailTemplate.name: Discretionary Approver No Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required : Pending Request # {!Discretionary__c.Name} - Program Name # {!Discretionary_Approval_history__c.DiscretionaryEmailProgram__c} - No Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell colleague,
Please note that NO response has been received on the subject approval request.
Please contact your Leadership, or resubmit, as this request has NOT been approved.
DO NOT REPLY – This “From” address is NOT monitored.
Thank you!
